---
title: "Nominals"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  message: false
---

```{=html}
<div class="nominals-controls"
     style="display:flex; gap:.75rem; flex-wrap:wrap; align-items:end; margin: 0 0 1rem 0;">

  <div>
    <label for="sectionSelect" style="display:block; font-weight:600; margin-bottom:.25rem;">View</label>
    <select id="sectionSelect" style="padding:.35rem; max-width:22rem;">
      <option value="overview" selected>General overview</option>
      <option value="nouns">Nouns</option>
      <option value="adjectives">Adjectives</option>
      <option value="pronouns">Pronouns</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <div id="pickWrap" style="display:none;">
    <label for="pickSelect" id="pickLabel" style="display:block; font-weight:600; margin-bottom:.25rem;">Choose…</label>
    <select id="pickSelect" style="padding:.35rem; max-width:34rem;">
      <option value="" selected>—</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <div id="exampleWrap" style="display:none;">
    <label for="exampleSelect" id="exampleLabel" style="display:block; font-weight:600; margin-bottom:.25rem;">Example</label>
    <select id="exampleSelect" style="padding:.35rem; max-width:34rem;">
      <option value="" selected>—</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <div id="cliticToggleWrap" style="display:none;">
    <label style="display:block; font-weight:600; margin-bottom:.25rem;">Pronouns</label>
    <label style="display:flex; align-items:center; gap:.4rem;">
      <input type="checkbox" id="showClitics">
      show clitics
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<div id="nominalsMain"></div>

<style>
table.nom-paradigm{
  border-collapse: collapse;
  margin: .75rem 0 1rem 0;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 62rem;
}
table.nom-paradigm th, table.nom-paradigm td{
  border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.15);
  padding: .25rem .4rem;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
table.nom-paradigm th:first-child{ text-align:left; white-space:nowrap; }
.nom-note{ opacity:.8; }
.nom-clitic{ opacity:.7; }
.nom-grid{ display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 1rem; }
@media (min-width: 900px){ .nom-grid{ grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } }
code{ font-size: .95em; }
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  "use strict";

  const LEXICON_URL   = "assets/data/lexicon.json";
  const PARADIGMS_URL = "assets/data/paradigms.json";

  const sectionSelect    = document.getElementById("sectionSelect");
  const pickWrap         = document.getElementById("pickWrap");
  const pickLabel        = document.getElementById("pickLabel");
  const pickSelect       = document.getElementById("pickSelect");
  const exampleWrap      = document.getElementById("exampleWrap");
  const exampleLabel     = document.getElementById("exampleLabel");
  const exampleSelect    = document.getElementById("exampleSelect");
  const cliticToggleWrap = document.getElementById("cliticToggleWrap");
  const showCliticsBox   = document.getElementById("showClitics");
  const main             = document.getElementById("nominalsMain");

  if (!sectionSelect || !pickWrap || !pickLabel || !pickSelect || !exampleWrap || !exampleLabel || !exampleSelect
      || !cliticToggleWrap || !showCliticsBox || !main) {
    console.error("Nominals: missing required DOM nodes.");
    return;
  }

  let LEX = [];
  let PAR = {};
  let currentPick = null;      // paradigm id OR adjective-class id OR pronoun lexeme id
  let currentExample = null;   // lexeme id (nouns/adjs)
  let currentPickList = [];    // list for pick dropdown (ids)
  let currentExampleList = []; // list for example dropdown (entries)

  // ---------- helpers ----------
  function esc(s){
    return String(s ?? "")
      .replaceAll("&","&amp;").replaceAll("<","&lt;").replaceAll(">","&gt;")
      .replaceAll('"',"&quot;").replaceAll("'","&#39;");
  }

  function getAny(o, keys, dflt=""){
    for (const k of keys){
      if (o && Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(o,k)){
        const v = o[k];
        if (v !== null && v !== undefined && String(v).trim() !== "") return v;
      }
    }
    return dflt;
  }

  function normPos(p){
    const s = String(p||"").trim().toLowerCase();
    if (s === "adj") return "adjective";
    return s || "other";
  }

  function lineForEntry(e){
    const lemma = getAny(e, ["lemma","headword","word"], e.id || "(?)");
    const gloss = getAny(e, ["gloss","meaning"], "");
    return gloss ? `${lemma} — ‘${gloss}’` : lemma;
  }

  function findEntryById(id){
    return LEX.find(e => String(e.id) === String(id)) || null;
  }

  // ---------- paradigms list (stem classes) ----------
  function listNominalParadigmIds(){
    return Object.keys(PAR || {})
      .filter(pid => {
        const p = PAR[pid];
        return p && typeof p === "object"
          && p.category === "nominal"
          && p.include_in_nom_paradigms === true;
      })
      .sort((a,b) => {
        const la = (PAR[a]?.label || a).toLowerCase();
        const lb = (PAR[b]?.label || b).toLowerCase();
        return la.localeCompare(lb);
      });
  }

  function paradigmLabel(pid){
    const p = PAR[pid];
    return (p && p.label) ? p.label : pid;
  }

  // Render a paradigm as ENDINGS ONLY (stem class view)
  function renderParadigmEndings(pid){
    const p = PAR[pid];
    if (!p) return `<p class="nom-note"><em>No paradigm data for: ${esc(pid)}</em></p>`;

    const cases = Array.isArray(p.cases) ? p.cases : ["nom","voc","acc","inst","dat","abl","gen","loc"];
    const nums  = Array.isArray(p.numbers) ? p.numbers : ["sg","du","pl"];
    const endings = (p.endings && typeof p.endings === "object") ? p.endings : {};

    let html = `<` + `table class="nom-paradigm"><thead><tr><th></th>`;
    html += nums.map(n => `<th>${esc(n)}</th>`).join("");
    html += `</tr></thead><tbody>`;

    for (const c of cases){
      html += `<tr><th>${esc(c)}</th>`;
      for (const n of nums){
        const key = `${c}_${n}`;
        const v = endings[key];
        html += `<td>${esc((v===null || v===undefined || v==="") ? "—" : String(v))}</td>`;
      }
      html += `</tr>`;
    }

    html += `</tbody></` + `table>`;
    return html;
  }

  // ---------- example realization (stem + ending) ----------
  function getStem(entry, genderTag){
    // Support additional stems, matching the lexicon strategy:
    // - stems: {m:"...", f:"...", n:"..."}
    // - stem_m / stem_f / stem_n
    // - strong_stem_m etc.
    if (genderTag){
      const fromObj = entry?.stems && typeof entry.stems === "object" ? entry.stems[genderTag] : "";
      const s = getAny(entry, [
        `strong_stem_${genderTag}`, `stem_${genderTag}`, `base_${genderTag}`, `root_${genderTag}`
      ], fromObj || "");
      if (s) return String(s).trim().replace(/-+$/,"");
    }

    let s = getAny(entry, ["strong_stem","stem","base","root","lemma"], "");
    s = String(s||"").trim();
    s = s.replace(/-+$/,"");
    return s;
  }

  function renderRealizedNominal(entry, pid, genderTag=null){
    const p = PAR[pid];
    if (!p) return `<p class="nom-note"><em>No paradigm data for: ${esc(pid)}</em></p>`;

    const cases = Array.isArray(p.cases) ? p.cases : ["nom","voc","acc","inst","dat","abl","gen","loc"];
    const nums  = Array.isArray(p.numbers) ? p.numbers : ["sg","du","pl"];
    const endings = (p.endings && typeof p.endings === "object") ? p.endings : {};
    const stem = getStem(entry, genderTag);

    let html = `<` + `table class="nom-paradigm"><thead><tr><th></th>`;
    html += nums.map(n => `<th>${esc(n)}</th>`).join("");
    html += `</tr></thead><tbody>`;

    for (const c of cases){
      html += `<tr><th>${esc(c)}</th>`;
      for (const n of nums){
        const key = `${c}_${n}`;
        const end = endings[key];
        const form = (!end || end==="—") ? "—" : (stem + String(end));
        html += `<td>${esc(form)}</td>`;
      }
      html += `</tr>`;
    }

    html += `</tbody></` + `table>`;
    return html;
  }

  // ---------- adjective classes ----------
  // Macro mapping: thematic adjectives use m=o-stem masc, n=o-stem neut, f=ah2-stem fem (and oxy variants)
  // Add more macros here as you create them.
  const ADJ_MACROS = {
    "adj_thematic":      { m: "o_stem_m",     f: "ah2_stem_f",     n: "o_stem_n" },
    "adj_thematic_oxy":  { m: "o_stem_m_oxy", f: "ah2_stem_f_oxy", n: "o_stem_n_oxy" }
  };

  // Allow multiple aliases for the same idea (so the page keeps working if you rename ids)
  const ADJ_ALIASES = {
    // common aliases you might use in lexicon.json
    "thematic_adj": "adj_thematic",
    "thematic_adjective": "adj_thematic",
    "adj_theme": "adj_thematic",
    "adj_thematic_bary": "adj_thematic",
    "them_adj": "adj_thematic",
    "them_adj_bary": "adj_thematic",

    // oxytonic thematic adj (your current lexicon uses this)
    "them_adj_oxy": "adj_thematic_oxy",
    "thematic_adj_oxy": "adj_thematic_oxy",
    "adj_theme_oxy": "adj_thematic_oxy",
    "adj_thematic_oxytonic": "adj_thematic_oxy"
  };

  function canonAdjClassId(pid){
    return ADJ_ALIASES[pid] || pid;
  }

  function listAdjectiveClassIds(){
    const ids = new Set();
    for (const e of LEX){
      if (normPos(e.pos) === "adjective"){
        const pid = getAny(e, ["paradigm"], "");
        if (pid) ids.add(canonAdjClassId(pid));
      }
    }
    return Array.from(ids).sort((a,b)=>a.localeCompare(b));
  }

  function adjectiveClassLabel(pid){
    const canon = canonAdjClassId(pid);
    if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(ADJ_MACROS, canon)) {
      const m = ADJ_MACROS[canon];
      return `${canon} (m:${m.m}, f:${m.f}, n:${m.n})`;
    }
    if (PAR && Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(PAR, canon)) return paradigmLabel(canon);
    return canon;
  }

  function renderAdjectiveExample(entry){
    const rawPid = getAny(entry, ["paradigm"], "");
    const pid = canonAdjClassId(rawPid);
    if (!pid) return `<p class="nom-note"><em>No adjective paradigm specified.</em></p>`;

    // Macro → 3 gender tables (using gender-specific stems if provided)
    if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(ADJ_MACROS, pid)){
      const map = ADJ_MACROS[pid];
      const head = `<div class="nom-note">Macro: <code>${esc(pid)}</code> → m=<code>${esc(map.m)}</code>, f=<code>${esc(map.f)}</code>, n=<code>${esc(map.n)}</code></div>`;
      const grid = `
        <div class="nom-grid">
          <div><h3>Masculine</h3>${renderRealizedNominal(entry, map.m, "m")}</div>
          <div><h3>Feminine</h3>${renderRealizedNominal(entry, map.f, "f")}</div>
          <div style="grid-column:1 / -1;"><h3>Neuter</h3>${renderRealizedNominal(entry, map.n, "n")}</div>
        </div>`;
      return head + grid;
    }

    // Otherwise: treat pid as a nominal-like paradigm id (single table)
    if (PAR && Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(PAR, pid)){
      return `<div class="nom-note">Paradigm ID: <code>${esc(pid)}</code></div>` + renderRealizedNominal(entry, pid, null);
    }

    return `<p class="nom-note"><em>Unknown adjective paradigm: ${esc(rawPid)}</em></p>`;
  }

  // ---------- pronouns (hardcoded) ----------
  const PRON_CASES = ["nom","voc","acc","gen","dat","abl","inst","loc"];
  const PRON_NUMS  = ["sg","du","pl"];

  function renderFormSlot(slot, showClitics){
    if (!slot) return "—";
    if (typeof slot === "string") return esc(slot);

    const tonic  = (slot.tonic  || []).filter(Boolean);
    const clitic = (slot.clitic || []).filter(Boolean);

    const main = tonic.length ? tonic.join(" / ")
              : (clitic.length ? clitic.join(" / ") : "—");

    if (!showClitics) return esc(main);
    if (!tonic.length || !clitic.length) return esc(main);

    return `${esc(main)} <span class="nom-clitic">(cl. ${esc(clitic.join(" / "))})</span>`;
  }

  function renderHardcodedPronoun(entry, showClitics){
    const forms = entry.forms || {};
    let html = `<` + `table class="nom-paradigm"><thead><tr><th></th>`;
    html += PRON_NUMS.map(n => `<th>${n}</th>`).join("");
    html += `</tr></thead><tbody>`;

    for (const c of PRON_CASES){
      html += `<tr><th>${c}</th>`;
      for (const n of PRON_NUMS){
        html += `<td>${renderFormSlot(forms[`${c}_${n}`], showClitics)}</td>`;
      }
      html += `</tr>`;
    }

    html += `</tbody></` + `table>`;
    return html;
  }

  // ---------- UI wiring ----------
  function setPickList(section){
    currentPick = null;
    currentExample = null;
    pickSelect.innerHTML = `<option value="" selected>—</option>`;
    exampleSelect.innerHTML = `<option value="" selected>—</option>`;
    currentPickList = [];
    currentExampleList = [];

    if (section === "overview") {
      pickWrap.style.display = "none";
      exampleWrap.style.display = "none";
      cliticToggleWrap.style.display = "none";
      showCliticsBox.checked = false;
      return;
    }

    pickWrap.style.display = "";
    cliticToggleWrap.style.display = (section === "pronouns") ? "" : "none";
    if (section !== "pronouns") showCliticsBox.checked = false;

    if (section === "pronouns") {
      pickLabel.textContent = "Choose a pronoun";
      exampleWrap.style.display = "none";

      currentPickList = LEX
        .filter(e => normPos(e.pos) === "pronoun")
        .slice()
        .sort((a,b) => lineForEntry(a).localeCompare(lineForEntry(b)))
        .map(e => e.id);

      pickSelect.innerHTML =
        `<option value="" selected>— select —</option>` +
        currentPickList.map(id => {
          const e = findEntryById(id);
          return `<option value="${esc(id)}">${esc(lineForEntry(e))}</option>`;
        }).join("");
      return;
    }

    if (section === "nouns") {
      pickLabel.textContent = "Choose a noun stem class";
      exampleWrap.style.display = "";

      const pids = listNominalParadigmIds();
      currentPickList = pids;

      pickSelect.innerHTML =
        `<option value="" selected>— select —</option>` +
        pids.map(pid => `<option value="${esc(pid)}">${esc(paradigmLabel(pid))}</option>`).join("");
      return;
    }

    // adjectives
    pickLabel.textContent = "Choose an adjective class";
    exampleWrap.style.display = "";

    const aids = listAdjectiveClassIds();
    currentPickList = aids;

    pickSelect.innerHTML =
      `<option value="" selected>— select —</option>` +
      aids.map(pid => `<option value="${esc(pid)}">${esc(adjectiveClassLabel(pid))}</option>`).join("");
  }

  function setExampleList(){
    const section = sectionSelect.value;
    exampleSelect.innerHTML = `<option value="" selected>— select —</option>`;
    currentExampleList = [];
    currentExample = null;

    if (section === "nouns") {
      exampleLabel.textContent = "Example noun";
      currentExampleList = LEX
        .filter(e => normPos(e.pos) === "noun" && String(getAny(e,["paradigm"],"")) === String(currentPick))
        .slice()
        .sort((a,b)=> lineForEntry(a).localeCompare(lineForEntry(b)));

      exampleSelect.innerHTML += currentExampleList.map(e =>
        `<option value="${esc(e.id)}">${esc(lineForEntry(e))}</option>`
      ).join("");
      return;
    }

    if (section === "adjectives") {
      exampleLabel.textContent = "Example adjective";
      currentExampleList = LEX
        .filter(e => normPos(e.pos) === "adjective" && String(canonAdjClassId(getAny(e,["paradigm"],""))) === String(currentPick))
        .slice()
        .sort((a,b)=> lineForEntry(a).localeCompare(lineForEntry(b)));

      exampleSelect.innerHTML += currentExampleList.map(e =>
        `<option value="${esc(e.id)}">${esc(lineForEntry(e))}</option>`
      ).join("");
      return;
    }
  }

  function render(){
    const section = sectionSelect.value;

    if (section === "overview") {
      main.innerHTML = `
        <h2>General overview</h2>
        <p class="nom-note">
          Use the menu above to explore nominal morphology.
          <br><strong>Nouns</strong>: choose a stem class, then view endings + an example lexeme.
          <br><strong>Adjectives</strong>: choose an adjective class (including thematic macros), then view an example paradigm.
          <br><strong>Pronouns</strong>: lexeme-specific paradigms (with optional clitics).
        </p>`;
      return;
    }

    if (!currentPick) {
      main.innerHTML = `<p class="nom-note"><em>Select an option above.</em></p>`;
      return;
    }

    if (section === "pronouns") {
      const e = findEntryById(currentPick);
      if (!e) { main.innerHTML = `<p class="nom-note"><em>Pronoun not found.</em></p>`; return; }

      const head = `<h2>${esc(getAny(e,["lemma"], e.id))} <span class="nom-note">(pronoun)</span></h2>
                    <p class="nom-note">${esc(getAny(e,["gloss"], ""))}</p>`;
      main.innerHTML = head + renderHardcodedPronoun(e, showCliticsBox.checked);
      return;
    }

    if (section === "nouns") {
      const pid = currentPick;
      const head = `<h2>${esc(paradigmLabel(pid))}</h2>
                    <p class="nom-note">Stem class: <code>${esc(pid)}</code></p>`;
      let html = head + `<h3>Endings</h3>` + renderParadigmEndings(pid);

      if (currentExample) {
        const ex = findEntryById(currentExample);
        if (ex) {
          html += `<h3>Example: ${esc(getAny(ex,["lemma"], ex.id))}</h3>` +
                  `<p class="nom-note">${esc(getAny(ex,["gloss"], ""))}</p>` +
                  renderRealizedNominal(ex, pid, null);
        }
      } else {
        html += `<p class="nom-note"><em>Select an example noun to see a filled paradigm.</em></p>`;
      }

      main.innerHTML = html;
      return;
    }

    // adjectives
    const cls = currentPick;
    const canonCls = canonAdjClassId(cls);

    const head = `<h2>${esc(adjectiveClassLabel(canonCls))}</h2>
                  <p class="nom-note">Class ID: <code>${esc(canonCls)}</code></p>`;
    let html = head;

    // Always show endings for the class (like nouns), so users can browse classes without selecting an example.
    if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(ADJ_MACROS, canonCls)) {
      const map = ADJ_MACROS[canonCls];
      html += `<h3>Endings (by gender)</h3>
        <div class="nom-grid">
          <div><h4>Masculine</h4>${renderParadigmEndings(map.m)}</div>
          <div><h4>Feminine</h4>${renderParadigmEndings(map.f)}</div>
          <div style="grid-column:1 / -1;"><h4>Neuter</h4>${renderParadigmEndings(map.n)}</div>
        </div>`;
    } else if (PAR && Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(PAR, canonCls)) {
      html += `<h3>Endings</h3>` + renderParadigmEndings(canonCls);
    } else {
      html += `<p class="nom-note"><em>No endings table available for this adjective class.</em></p>`;
    }

    // Example (filled paradigm)
    if (currentExample) {
      const ex = findEntryById(currentExample);
      if (ex) {
        html += `<h3>Example: ${esc(getAny(ex,["lemma"], ex.id))}</h3>` +
                `<p class="nom-note">${esc(getAny(ex,["gloss"], ""))}</p>` +
                renderAdjectiveExample(ex);
      } else {
        html += `<p class="nom-note"><em>Example not found.</em></p>`;
      }
    } else {
      html += `<p class="nom-note"><em>Select an example adjective to see a filled paradigm.</em></p>`;
    }

    main.innerHTML = html;
  }

  async function init(){
    const [lexResp, parResp] = await Promise.all([
      fetch(LEXICON_URL, { cache: "no-store" }),
      fetch(PARADIGMS_URL, { cache: "no-store" })
    ]);

    LEX = await lexResp.json();
    PAR = await parResp.json();

    setPickList(sectionSelect.value);
    render();
  }

  // events
  sectionSelect.addEventListener("change", () => {
    setPickList(sectionSelect.value);
    render();
  });

  pickSelect.addEventListener("change", () => {
    currentPick = pickSelect.value || null;
    currentExample = null;

    if (sectionSelect.value === "nouns" || sectionSelect.value === "adjectives") {
      setExampleList();
      exampleWrap.style.display = currentPick ? "" : "none";
    } else {
      exampleWrap.style.display = "none";
    }

    render();
  });

  exampleSelect.addEventListener("change", () => {
    currentExample = exampleSelect.value || null;
    render();
  });

  showCliticsBox.addEventListener("change", () => {
    if (sectionSelect.value === "pronouns") render();
  });

  init().catch(err => {
    console.error(err);
    main.innerHTML = `<p class="nom-note"><strong>Error:</strong> ${esc(err?.message || String(err))}</p>`;
  });
});
</script>
```
